title: eyes don't lie
author: Isabel LaRosa
lyrics:
[00:02.61] Eyes don't lie
[00:06.47] Eyes don't lie
[00:10.10] Say you're mine
[00:14.05] Eyes don't lie
[00:18.24] Can't lie to you, baby
[00:20.35] Wanna feel your body close
[00:25.67] You say that you hate me
[00:27.97] Then tell me shit nobody knows
[00:33.64] Yeah, you're beautiful, don't have to try
[00:37.47] Darling, you look divine
[00:40.87] Eyes don't lie
[00:44.58] Eyes don't lie
[00:48.53] Say you're mine
[00:52.13] Eyes don't lie
[00:56.38] You tell me your secrets
[00:58.66] You keep your life between your lips
[01:04.12] You know you're my weakness
[01:06.17] Tell stories with your fingertips
[01:11.92] Yeah, you're beautiful, don't have to try
[01:15.77] Darling, you look divine
[01:18.90] Eyes don't lie
[01:23.17] Eyes don't lie
[01:26.83] Say you're mine
[01:30.66] Eyes don't lie
[01:35.26] I swear friends don't get this close
[01:39.41] Pull you in exchanging souls
[01:43.29] Trace my skin, losing control
[01:48.19] 
[01:50.43] Eyes don't lie
[01:53.62] Eyes don't lie
[01:57.77] Say you're mine
[02:01.42] Eyes don't lie
[02:05.23] Eyes don't lie
[02:09.15] Eyes don't lie
[02:12.94] Say you're mine
[02:16.79] Eyes don't lie
[02:19.57]
